Headline: #3 King Drive, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, and #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 3, 147, 151 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express,  and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 146 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan, near Michigan/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to construction near Michigan/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
